quote: What comes from sorrow, watered by tears, grows something of beauty. A salt garden. And so this I leave behind. A harvest for those who find their way into my life and I into theirs.
quote_letters: WHAT COMES FROM SORROW WATERED BY TEARS GROWS SOMETHING OF BEAUTY A SALT GARDEN AND SO THIS I LEAVE BEHIND A HARVEST FOR THOSE WHO FIND THEIR WAY INTO MY LIFE AND I INTO THEIRS
